property.name: onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:messageText: Will be moved below the Total Credit line
Will be moved above the Total Credit line

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:messageText: Create your plan by finding and adding courses to any quarter.

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:title: @{#line.showAlert ? #line.courseDetails.code + ' is not scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName : #line.courseDetails.code + ' is scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName}
bean.p:altText: @{#line.showAlert ? #line.courseDetails.code + ' is not scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName : #line.courseDetails.code + ' is scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName}

bean.p:title: @{#line.showAlert ? #line.courseDetails.code + ' is not scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName : #line.courseDetails.code + ' is scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName}
bean.p:altText: @{#line.showAlert ? #line.courseDetails.code + ' is not scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName : #line.courseDetails.code + ' is scheduled for '+ #line.planItemDataObject.termName}

property.name: style
property.value: margin-top:1px; font-size:0.8462em; height:25px; line-height:25px; padding:0 5px; display:block; text-align:center;

bean.p:headerText: @{courseInPlan eq false AND courseInBackup eq true ? 'Add to Backup' : 'Add to Plan'}

bean.p:messageText: Would you like to add @{courseDetails.code} @{sectionCode} to @{termName}
bean.p:render: @{courseInPlan eq false AND courseInBackup eq false ? true : false}

bean.p:messageText: You can only add @{courseDetails.code} @{sectionCode} for @{termName} as Plan
bean.p:render: @{courseInPlan eq true AND courseInBackup eq false ? true : false}

bean.p:messageText: You can only add @{courseDetails.code} @{sectionCode} for @{termName} as Backup
bean.p:render: @{courseInPlan eq false AND courseInBackup eq true ? true : false}

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:render: @{courseInPlan eq false AND courseInBackup eq true ? true : false}
